name: C16 Biosciences
headline: Next-gen ingredients to decarbonize consumer products, starting w/â¦
description: C16 Biosciences is decarbonizing consumer products supply chains by producing next-generation ingredients. The company's biomanufacturing platform produces better performing, more sustainable alternatives to oils and fats, and their first product is an alternative to palm oil. The company owns and operates Palmlessâ¢ alternative fats and oils.

raw_markdown="![c16Biosciences logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/652d6b993a31480f68edf998_Group%201005.png)
[C16 Biosciences](https://www.c16bio.com/</>)[Our Technology](https://www.c16bio.com/</technology>)[Press & Awards](https://www.c16bio.com/</press-awards>)[Careers](https://www.c16bio.com/</careers>)[Partner with Us](https://www.c16bio.com/</partner-with-us>)[EUDR](https://www.c16bio.com/</eudr>)[Palmless™](https://www.c16bio.com/<https:/www.gopalmless.com/>)
[Palmless™](https://www.c16bio.com/<https:/www.gopalmless.com/>)
# Better ingredients, biodesigned.
High performance ingredients without compromise, made for the world’s leading consumer goods manufacturers.
[Work with us](https://www.c16bio.com/</partner-with-us>)
## The new natural
### Enabling health, wellness, and sustainability
We are working with some of the most innovative brands and product manufacturers across the beauty, personal care and food categories to bring better solutions to their customers who are demanding them.Our partners are motivated to create performance-driven products that deliver for discerning customers who know personal health and planetary health are not in conflict and are both essential. If this describes you, we’d love to work with you. 
[Partner with us![Button right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f324d9c46307001765_Arrow-Right.svg)![Orange arrow right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f4aa9b8b753a769edc_Arrow-Right%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.c16bio.com/</partner-with-us>)
![a group of objects on a table](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a1a02ce4d50c3f391c9a86_Screenshot%202024-01-11%20at%204.31%201.jpg)
## The Palmless™ platform
### Materials for a better world
Ingredients are the backbone of beauty, personal care, home care, and food products, but current sources are vulnerable to supply (and price) volatility as well as consumer and regulator pushback.To power the next generation of consumer goods - products that are better performing and better for the planet - we developed a proprietary biomanufacturing platform to produce high value, high impact ingredients.
[Go Palmless™![Button right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f324d9c46307001765_Arrow-Right.svg)![Orange arrow right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f4aa9b8b753a769edc_Arrow-Right%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.c16bio.com/<https:/www.gopalmless.com/>)
![C16 Biosciences products](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65569b2432c8e89a3e963cd3_c16%20press%20%2B%20awards.jpg)
### Palmless™ Torula Oil
Torula oil is a super-emollient that nourishes, repairs, and protects. It is packed with antioxidant carotenoids, sterols and terpenoids demonstrated to improve skin barrier function, protect against UV rays, free radicals and environmental hazards, and reduce appearance of fine lines and redness.Clinically proven to boost the performance of UVA and UVB protection in SPF formulations, Torula oil is beauty’s new super-ingredient.
[Learn more![Button right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f324d9c46307001765_Arrow-Right.svg)![Orange arrow right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f4aa9b8b753a769edc_Arrow-Right%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.c16bio.com/<https:/www.gopalmless.com/torula-oil>)
![a hand holding an ice cream cone with sprinkles](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a19aa57579210c6e7b5963_Group%201009.webp)
### Palmless™ in Food
Our biodesign platform provides targeted, designer fat and oil profiles that are safe, high performance, and natural. Lipids play a critical role in the majority of products on supermarket shelves – they provide the creamy mouthfeel in ice cream, the satisfying snap of a cookie, and the delightful spreadability of nut butters.Our team has shown the versatility of Palmless™ Refined Oil across these applications, and with a $3.5 million grant from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation together with a $1 million investment from Elemental Excelerator to focus on our scale up in food, Palmless™ will be ready for its commercial food debut imminently. 
[Learn more![Button right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f324d9c46307001765_Arrow-Right.svg)![Orange arrow right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f4aa9b8b753a769edc_Arrow-Right%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.c16bio.com/<https:/www.gopalmless.com/potential#food>)
![PANGAIA LAB Rewild Body Block powered by Palmless™ Torula Oil](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a19d01835070f0d1f242c4_Screenshot%202024-01-11%20at%204.04%203.webp)
### Palmless™ in Home & Personal Care
Triglycerides, fatty acids, and fatty alcohols are key functional ingredients driving performance in shampoos and soaps, toothpaste and laundry detergent.Our biodesigned oils are easily converted into a range of ingredients currently derived from palm oil, offering more secure and more sustainable sourcing. On top of that, Palmless™ ingredients offer functional benefits across home and personal care formulations.
[Learn more![Button right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f324d9c46307001765_Arrow-Right.svg)![Orange arrow right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f4aa9b8b753a769edc_Arrow-Right%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.c16bio.com/<https:/www.gopalmless.com/potential#personal-care>)
## Meet C16 Bio
### About us
We’re a team of scientists, engineers, brand-builders, and entrepreneurs working to decarbonize products. We want to buy products that are good for human health and planetary health – so we’re taking initiative to build that future.
[Join our team![Button right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f324d9c46307001765_Arrow-Right.svg)![Orange arrow right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f4aa9b8b753a769edc_Arrow-Right%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.c16bio.com/</careers>)
![ Shara Ticku and David Heller standing next to a plant](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a70b2887f71bd49d1eb875_Screenshot%202024-01-16%20at%2012.12%201.webp)
[**Shara Ticku**](https://www.c16bio.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/sharaticku/>)
### Co-Founder & Chief Executive Officer
[**David Heller**](https://www.c16bio.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/david-heller-343981b2/>)
### Co-Founder & Chief Operating Officer
### Commercial advisory board
Our group of experts providing strategic insights, advice, and guidance to C16 Biosciences to help us make informed decisions and achieve our goals.
[Meet the board![Button right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f324d9c46307001765_Arrow-Right.svg)![Orange arrow right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6463d087d4055c335f36fdd5/65a9a4f4aa9b8b753a769edc_Arrow-Right%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.c16bio.com/</advisory-board>)

generated_description:
C16 Biosciences is a dynamic startup founded in 2018 and based in New York City, operating out of Y Combinator Batch S18. The company is on a mission to revolutionize the ingredients used in consumer products by developing next-gen, sustainable alternatives to traditional oils and fats, with its flagship product being a palm oil alternative dubbed Palmless™.

At its core, C16 aims to decarbonize supply chains for consumer products, focusing primarily on the beauty, personal care, and food sectors. The team, composed of around 35 talented individuals—scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs—leverages a proprietary biomanufacturing platform that produces high-value, environmentally friendly ingredients. Their innovations are driven by a growing consumer demand for products that do not compromise on health or sustainability.

One of their standout products, Palmless™ Torula Oil, boasts impressive capabilities as a super-emollient and has been clinically shown to enhance the effectiveness of UV protection in skincare formulations. Furthermore, C16 is poised to make its commercial debut in the food sector soon, backed by significant funding from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation and Elemental Excelerator.

C16 Biosciences strives to be at the forefront of biotechnology and sustainability, inviting partnerships with leading brands keen on creating products that promote both personal and planetary health. They view the quest for eco-friendly ingredients not just as a trend, but as a necessity for the future. If you're in the market for better ingredients that align with a sustainable ethos, C16 Biosciences is definitely worth watching. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [C16 Biosciences](https://www.c16bio.com/).
